byline.original: By CHRISTINE HAUSER and JONAH ENGEL BROMWICH

abstract: Unidentified lawyer wearing military uniform with Nazi emblem shoots and wounds nine random passers-by in upscale area of Houston before he is shot and killed by police; gunman had almost 2,600 rounds of ammunition.

headline.print_headline: Houston Gunman With Nazi Emblem  Injures 9 Before Being Killed by Police
headline.main: Houston Gunman With Nazi Emblem Injures 9 Before Being Killed by Police

snippet: The gunman was a lawyer who had issues with his law firm, the police said at a news conference. Nine other people were injured....
lead_paragraph: The gunman was a lawyer who had issues with his law firm, the police said at a news conference. Nine other people were injured.
